languages.text: Психический крик, разносившийся в Имматериуме, умолк, но это не принесло облегчения. С ужасом астропаты поняли, что звуки вопля скрывали звучание более страшное, ирреальное... Рожденная варп-штормом титанической силы, мелодия катаклизма звенит, вероятно, по всему Простору. Она заглушает астропатические послания и пробирается в умы псайкеров в облике одного и того же образа — {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}черной пасти{/g}, рассекшей пополам вселенную. Теперь, когда крик сошедшего с ума хормейстера более не заглушает песнь Имматериума, она коснулась и корабля Вольного Торговца.

The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.
languages.original_text: Психический крик, разносившийся в Имматериуме, умолк, но это не принесло облегчения. С ужасом астропаты поняли, что звуки вопля скрывали звучание более страшное, ирреальное... Рожденная варп-штормом титанической силы, мелодия катаклизма звенит, вероятно, по всему Простору. Она заглушает астропатические послания и пробирается в умы псайкеров в облике одного и того же образа — {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}черной пасти{/g}, рассекшей пополам вселенную. Теперь, когда крик сошедшего с ума хормейстера более не заглушает песнь Имматериума, она коснулась и корабля Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The psychic scream that carried across the Immaterium has been silenced, but it brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the scream was masking a different sound, even more terrifying and surreal. The melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It smothers Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

Weisz also spoke about the conversation he had with the late Choirmaster of the station. According to him, the Immaterium's tumult had struck suddenly and swiftly, tearing apart the minds of the Astropaths. In their terror, they summoned a horrific manifestation from the warp that decimated the station. Before he died, the Choirmaster insistently shared the same image with Weisz again and again: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. A terrifying and alarming symbol.

The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

languages.text: El aullido psíquico que se propagaba por el inmaterio ha sido acallado, pero el alivio de la tripulación ha durado muy poco. Los Astrópatas descubrieron espantados que los gritos enmascaraban un sonido muy distinto, aún más terrorífico y surrealista. Se trataba de la melodía de un cataclismo originado en una tormenta disforme de proporciones titánicas, tan intensa que toda la Expansión debía de ser capaz de oírla. Ahoga los mensajes astropáticos y se cuela en las mentes de los psíquicos, evocando la misma imagen en todas partes: unas fauces oscuras e inmensas que dividen el universo en dos. Ahora que por fin han cesado los gritos del enloquecido maestro del Coro, la canción del inmaterio también llega a la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

traits.locale_text: El aullido psíquico que se propagaba por el inmaterio ha sido acallado, pero el alivio de la tripulación ha durado muy poco. Los Astrópatas descubrieron espantados que los gritos enmascaraban un sonido muy distinto, aún más terrorífico y surrealista. Se trataba de la melodía de un cataclismo originado en una tormenta disforme de proporciones titánicas, tan intensa que toda la Expansión debía de ser capaz de oírla. Ahoga los mensajes astropáticos y se cuela en las mentes de los psíquicos, evocando la misma imagen en todas partes: unas fauces oscuras e inmensas que dividen el universo en dos. Ahora que por fin han cesado los gritos del enloquecido maestro del Coro, la canción del inmaterio también llega a la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.

Weisz también habló sobre la conversación que mantuvo con el fallecido maestro del Coro de la estación. En sus palabras, el tumulto del Inmaterio impactó de forma repentina y veloz, arrasando las mentes de los Astrópatas. En su pavor, convocaron una aterradora manifestación de la disformidad que destruyó la estación. Antes de morir, el maestro del Coro compartió una imagen de forma insistente con Weisz: unas fauces oscuras e inmensas dividiendo al universo en dos. Un símbolo tan escalofriante como alarmante.

languages.text: 非物質世界に響き渡っていたサイキックの悲鳴は収まったものの、クルーには何の安堵ももたらされなかった。その叫び声が別の音、もっと恐ろしく、非現実的な音を隠していることに気づき、感応通信官たちはゾッとした。それは、膨大な力を持つ〈歪み〉の嵐から生まれた大変動の旋律であり、エクスパンス全域に響き渡るほど強烈なものだった。それは感応通信官のメッセージを消し去り、異能者の心の中に入り込み、至る所で同じイメージを呼び起こす。真っ暗な、ぽっかりと口を開けた、獣のような口が宇宙を真っ二つに裂く。狂気のクワイアーマスターがようやく叫び声を止めた今、非物質世界の歌が自由開拓者のヴォイドシップにも届いていた。
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

traits.locale_text: 非物質世界に響き渡っていたサイキックの悲鳴は収まったものの、クルーには何の安堵ももたらされなかった。その叫び声が別の音、もっと恐ろしく、非現実的な音を隠していることに気づき、感応通信官たちはゾッとした。それは、膨大な力を持つ〈歪み〉の嵐から生まれた大変動の旋律であり、エクスパンス全域に響き渡るほど強烈なものだった。それは感応通信官のメッセージを消し去り、異能者の心の中に入り込み、至る所で同じイメージを呼び起こす。真っ暗な、ぽっかりと口を開けた、獣のような口が宇宙を真っ二つに裂く。狂気のクワイアーマスターがようやく叫び声を止めた今、非物質世界の歌が自由開拓者のヴォイドシップにも届いていた。

ワイズは再びステーションの亡きクワイアーマスターとの会話についても話してくれた。ワイズの話では、非物質世界の混乱は急にドバッと襲いかかってきて、感応通信官たちの心をズタズタにしたとのこと。彼らは恐怖に駆られて、<歪み>から恐ろしいものを呼び出し、ステーションを壊滅させた。亡きクワイアーマスターは死ぬ前に、何度も何度もワイズに同じイメージを共有していた。それは、宇宙を真っ二つに裂く、暗く、ガバッと開いた獣のような口だった。ただならぬ恐ろしいシンボルだ。

languages.text: 亚空间中灵能的尖啸声消失了，但船员们并没有为此松一口气。星语者们发现，尖啸声不过是为了掩盖另一种更加恐怖、更加超乎现实的声音，这样的发现让所有人不寒而栗。那个声音的旋律来自恐怖的大灾变，源于由某种恐怖力量诱发的亚空间风暴。它的声音是如此强烈，整个科罗努斯扩区都能听得到。它吞没了星语者的信息，闯入了所有灵能者的意识，在所有人脑海中唤起了同样的画面——野兽张开了黑暗的巨口，将整个宇宙一分为二。如今，发疯的唱诗大师终于停止了尖叫，而亚空间的歌声也传到了行商浪人的虚空舰上。
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间中灵能的尖啸声消失了，但船员们并没有为此松一口气。星语者们发现，尖啸声不过是为了掩盖另一种更加恐怖、更加超乎现实的声音，这样的发现让所有人不寒而栗。那个声音的旋律来自恐怖的大灾变，源于由某种恐怖力量诱发的亚空间风暴。它的声音是如此强烈，整个科罗努斯扩区都能听得到。它吞没了星语者的信息，闯入了所有灵能者的意识，在所有人脑海中唤起了同样的画面——野兽张开了黑暗的巨口，将整个宇宙一分为二。如今，发疯的唱诗大师终于停止了尖叫，而亚空间的歌声也传到了行商浪人的虚空舰上。
威茨还谈到了他与已故唱诗大师之间的交流。据他声称，亚空间的湍流毫无征兆地来袭，撕碎了所有星语者的意识。在恐惧之中，他们从亚空间中召唤出了可怕的实体，将整座星站化为了一片死地。在他去世之前，这位唱诗大师坚持一次又一次地与威茨分享同样的画面——野兽张开了黑暗的巨口，将整个宇宙一分为二。这样的景象既令人恐惧，又让人警惕。

languages.text: Das psionische Kreischen, das durch das Immaterium hallte, ist verstummt, aber die Crew ist dennoch nicht erleichtert. Als die Astropathen erkannten, dass der Schrei ein anderes Geräusch überlagerte, das noch entsetzlicher und surrealer war, beschlich sie eine verstörende Erkenntnis. Es war die Melodie eines aus einem Warpsturm geborenen Kataklysmus, eines Sturms von titanischer Stärke, der in der gesamten Ausdehnung zu hören gewesen sein muss. Er murmelt astropathische Nachrichten und kriecht in den Verstand von Psionikern, um überall dasselbe Bild zu erwecken: ein dunkles, klaffendes, monströses Maul, das das Universum in zwei Teile spaltet. Nun, da der wahnsinnige Chormeister endlich nicht mehr schreit, hat das Lied des Immateriums auch das Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erreicht.
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

traits.locale_text: Das psionische Kreischen, das durch das Immaterium hallte, ist verstummt, aber die Crew ist dennoch nicht erleichtert. Als die Astropathen erkannten, dass der Schrei ein anderes Geräusch überlagerte, das noch entsetzlicher und surrealer war, beschlich sie eine verstörende Erkenntnis. Es war die Melodie eines aus einem Warpsturm geborenen Kataklysmus, eines Sturms von titanischer Stärke, der in der gesamten Ausdehnung zu hören gewesen sein muss. Er murmelt astropathische Nachrichten und kriecht in den Verstand von Psionikern, um überall dasselbe Bild zu erwecken: ein dunkles, klaffendes, monströses Maul, das das Universum in zwei Teile spaltet. Nun, da der wahnsinnige Chormeister endlich nicht mehr schreit, hat das Lied des Immateriums auch das Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erreicht.

Weisz sprach auch von seinem Gespräch mit dem verstorbenen Chormeister der Station. Offenbar hatte der Tumult des Immateriums urplötzlich zugeschlagen und den Verstand der Astropathen blitzschnell vollkommen zerfetzt. In ihrem Entsetzten hatten sie eine grauenhafte Manifestation des Warps herbeigerufen, die die Station dezimiert hatte. Bevor er starb, teilte der Chormeister wieder und wieder dasselbe Bild mit Weisz: ein dunkles, klaffendes, monströses Maul, das das Universum in zwei Teile spaltet. Ein furchterregendes, alarmierendes Symbol.

languages.text: Le cri psychique qui résonnait à travers l'Immaterium a été réduit au silence, mais l'équipage ne s'en trouve pas soulagé pour autant. Une prise de conscience glaçante s'est abattue sur les astropathes lorsqu'ils se sont rendu compte que le hurlement masquait un autre son, plus terrifiant et surnaturel encore. La mélodie d'un cataclysme né d'une tempête Warp à la puissance colossale, si assourdissante qu'elle doit résonner à travers l'ensemble des Étendues. Elle brouille les messages astropathiques et s'insinue dans les esprits des psykers, conjurant où qu'elle passe une seule et même image : celle d'une gueule bestiale béante à la noirceur insondable scindant l'univers en deux parties distinctes. Lorsque le maître de chœur a enfin cessé de hurler comme un forcené, le chant de l'Immaterium a atteint à son tour le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.

traits.locale_text: Le cri psychique qui résonnait à travers l'Immaterium a été réduit au silence, mais l'équipage ne s'en trouve pas soulagé pour autant. Une prise de conscience glaçante s'est abattue sur les astropathes lorsqu'ils se sont rendu compte que le hurlement masquait un autre son, plus terrifiant et surnaturel encore. La mélodie d'un cataclysme né d'une tempête Warp à la puissance colossale, si assourdissante qu'elle doit résonner à travers l'ensemble des Étendues. Elle brouille les messages astropathiques et s'insinue dans les esprits des psykers, conjurant où qu'elle passe une seule et même image : celle d'une gueule bestiale béante à la noirceur insondable scindant l'univers en deux parties distinctes. Lorsque le maître de chœur a enfin cessé de hurler comme un forcené, le chant de l'Immaterium a atteint à son tour le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

Weisz évoque également la conversation qu'il a eue avec le défunt maître de chœur de la station. D'après lui, le tumulte de l'Immaterium a frappé sans prévenir et avec une rare violence, déchirant les esprits des astropathes qui, submergés par la terreur, ont alors invoqué une ignoble manifestation du Warp. C'est cette dernière qui a décimé la station. Avant de mourir, le maître de chœur a montré à Weisz une seule et même image en boucle : une bouche sombre, béante et bestiale fendant l'univers en deux. Un symbole aussi terrifiant qu'inquiétant.

languages.text: Tindiyar'ın dört bir yanına yayılan ruhsezi çığlığının sesinin kesilmesi bile mürettebatı rahatlatmadı. Astropatlar, ürpertici bir hakikati fark etti. Bu çığlığın daha da ürkütücü ve gerçeküstü bir sesi bastırdığını keşfettiler. Muazzam güçteki bir öteboyut fırtınasından doğan felaketin melodisiydi bu. Öylesine yoğundu ki tüm Enginlik'in duyması kaçınılmazdı. Astropatların mesajlarını baskılayarak ruhsezerlerin zihinlerine sinsice giren ve her yerde aynı görüntüye hayat veren bir çığlıktı. Görüntüde canavarlara yaraşır türden koyu renkte, açık bir ağız; evreni ikiye ayırıyordu. Deliye dönen Koro Şefi en nihayetinde çığlık atmayı kestiği için Tindiyar'ın şarkısı, artık Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisine de erişmişti.
languages.original_text: The psychic shriek carrying across the Immaterium has been silenced, but this has brought the crew no relief. A chilling realisation came to the Astropaths when they discovered that the cry was masking a different sound, one even more terrifying and surreal. It was the melody of a cataclysm born from a warp storm of titanic power, so intense that the entire Expanse must be able to hear it. It muffles Astropathic messages and crawls into psykers' minds, evoking everywhere the same image: a dark, gaping, beastly mouth cleaving the universe in two. Now that the mad Choirmaster has finally stopped screaming, the song of the Immaterium has reached the Rogue Trader's voidship too.
